Talk1001:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I see. <sp:5:1:0>So Princess Zelda's whereabouts
are still unknown, you say.

Since that is the case, Link, I encourage
you to go and speak with <clr:0000>Lady Impa<clr:ffff>.
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I could have sworn I saw you go up in our
balloon with Lady Impa earlier.

That must mean that you managed to fix it
for us. Thank you, Link!
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Where should we go next for our
investigation?<sp:0:4:0>Hm, we really should pay a visit to the
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple <clr:ffff>at the bottom of the
gorge in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>...
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>She is right over there.


I believe she may have some useful
information that relates to <clr:0000>the search
for Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>!
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems we've finished investigating the
geoglyph here.<sp:0:4:0>However, there are still many places left
to investigate across the kingdom.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I wonder where we should go next...<sp:0:4:0>Should we venture to the <clr:0000>Forgotten
Temple <clr:ffff>at the bottom of the gorge
in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>?
Or perhaps we should visit the geoglyphs
in another region...
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lady Impa is over there.


I believe she may have some useful
information that relates to <clr:0000>the search
for Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>!
Talk1005:

Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Were you able to speak with Lady Impa?


She should be able to contribute to the
search for Princess Zelda, but with our
research balloon in its current state...
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>At any rate, does Lady Impa intend to
continue her pondering over there?

I should really ask her to come into the
stable about now so she doesn't wear
herself out.
